summary: A group of French students are drawn into the psychological and sexual games of a mysterious Dutchman. Once they sample his "fear powder" the students experience a series of hallucinations.
cast: Catherine Jourdan|Pierre Zimmer|Richard Leduc|Lorraine Rainer|Sylvain Corthay|Juraj Kukura|Jarmila Kolenicová|Catherine Robbe-Grillet|Frantisek Gervai|Ludovít Króner|Dusan Jamrich|Stefánia Minárová|Peter Opálený|Marian Sotnik|Ladislav Ucník|Eva Luther|J. Villars
keywords: female full frontal nudity|female rear nudity|torture|surrealism|allegory
title: L'Eden et après
